title: The Ashtray of the Phoenix
tagline: In a desert of forgotten gods, a thief must steal a revolution from the ashes of the past.

story: Write a chapter from the perspective of the infant on the train, experiencing the heat, thirst, and rising tension as pure, synesthetic sensation.
Create a 'found document'—a ledger page from Hacienda La Lumbre, a revolutionary pamphlet hidden in the library, or a love letter—that reveals a hidden layer of the class conflict.
Narrate the history of the brass ashtray, from its forging to its moment of liberation, as a silent witness to decades of oppression and resistance.
Describe a surrealist 'manifestation' of class rage in San Ignacio: perhaps the statues of founders begin to weep salt, or the streets develop a hunger that only consumes the wealthy.
technical: Build an interactive map of the train, the desert, and the hacienda, where hovering over locations triggers sensory descriptions (smells, sounds, textures) and fragments of character memory.
Create a text generator that produces 'Surrealist Class Struggle Proclamations' in the style of the novel, using a vocabulary bank of bodily, geological, and archaic terms.

cover_prompt: A gaunt thief, their face etched with the grit of the desert, clutches a smoldering ceramic ashtray from which a spectral, half-formed phoenix of ash and ember struggles to ascend, [Detailed Scene & Context] in the ruins of a colossal, sand-blasted cathedral where the stone saints have melted into liquid shapes and the floor is a mosaic of shattered revolutionary icons, under a sky charted with surreal, oppressive constellations that mirror the city's slums below, [Artistic Style & Medium] in the atmospheric style of Leonora Carrington and Remedios Varo, rendered in hyper-detailed oil painting with textures of cracked clay, drifting ash, and luminous, alchemical pigments, [Composition & Camera] book cover framing with a centered, dramatic low-angle shot that emphasizes the towering, haunted architecture bearing down on the figure, creating a sense of monumental struggle, [Lighting & Color Palette] dramatic chiaroscuro lighting from the ashtray's internal glow and a searing desert sun, casting long, distorted shadows, using a palette of burnt sienna, deep ochre, spectral cobalt, and the violent, radiant gold of molten metal, [Quality & Technical Enforcers] masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev.
